title: Adventuring is No Yolk | Adventure is Nigh - The Platinum Heart | S2 EP 3
description:
Adventure Is Nigh: The Platinum Heart episode 2 is sponsored by Foundry Virtual Tabletop (https://foundryvtt.com), a standalone application built for experiencing multiplayer tabletop RPGs using a feature-rich and modern self-hosted application where your players connect directly through the browser!
